g.aria-label: Y-axis titled 'Relative GHG emissions (%)' for a linear scale with values from 0 to 100
X-axis for a discrete scale with 4 values: Initial, (Carbon Intensity), (Usage), Target
Y-axis titled 'Relative GHG emissions (%)' for a linear scale with values from 0 to 100
X-axis for a discrete scale with 4 values: Initial, (Usage), (Carbon Intensity), Target
Y-axis for a discrete scale with 3 values: Target, (Carbon Intensity), (Usage)
X-axis titled 'GHG emissions reduction (cB)' for a linear scale with values from -100 to 0
Title text 'Classical and centibel-based visualizations of a carbon strategy compounding efficiency and frugality gains'
g.text: Classical and centibel-based visualizations of a carbon strategy compounding efficiency and frugality gains

g.aria-label: Subtitle text 'Note that all 3 charts represent exactly the same reduction actions. By using centibels, the 3rd chart is not biased towards a particular factor.'
g.text: Note that all 3 charts represent exactly the same reduction actions. By using centibels, the 3rd chart is not biased towards a particular factor.
